rukus.text: Akasamandalata yi yi ache arau prthiraita yi yi ache sakalorae allahara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karae; arau te'om prabalaparaakramasali, prajnamaya
He imandarasakala! Tomaloke yito nakaraa se'ito kiya koraa
tomaloke yito nakaraa tomalokara se'ito koraa allahara drstita bara asantosajanaka
Niscaya allaha te'omlokaka bhalapaya, yisakale te'omra pathata saraibad'dhabharae yud'dha karae; yeniba sihamta galita siherae nirmita sudrrha praacira

Arau smarana karaa, mucha'i yetiya te'omra sampradayaka kaichila, ‘he mora sampradaya! Tomaloke kiya moka kasta di acha? Athaca tomaloke jana ye, niscaya ma'i tomalokara prati (praeraita) allahara raachula’. Tara pichata sihamte yetiya bakra patha aralambana karaile tetiya allahe sihamtara hrdayasamuhaka bakra karai dile; arau allahe phachikba sampradayaka hidayata nakarae

Arau smarana karaa, yetiya marayamara putra icha'i kaichila, he bani icharaa'ila! ‘Niscaya ma'i tomalokara prati praeraita allahara raachula arau mora purbararti ta'oraatara satyayanakarai arau ejana raachulara susambadadata, yijana mora pichata ahiba, yara nama ahamada’. Tara pichata te'om yetiya suspasta nidarsanasamuha lai agamana karaile, tetiya sihamte ka’le, ‘eya spasta yadu’
Se'i byaktitakai adhika yalima arau kona ha’ba parae? Yiye allaha samparke micha racana karae, athaca taka ichalamara prati ahbana karaa haya; arau allahe yalima sampradayaka hidayata nakarae
Sihamte allahara jyotika mukherae phum marai nirbapita karaiba bicarae, arau allahe nija jyotika purnatadanakarai. Yadi'o kaphirasakale iyaka apachanda karae
Teraemi nija raachulaka praerana karaiche hidayata arau satya dbinasaha sakalo dbinara oparata te'omka bijayi karaara babe, yadi'o musbaraikasakale iyaka apachanda karae
